name: F%$#IN BIRDS!
description:
Game Jam Entry for Ludum Dare 49 - Theme "Unstable"

Today's a good day to train your balance

Unfortunately you forgot to check the weather, and it's crazy windy!

Help the gymnast stay balanced
by SHOUTING or BLOWING into your MICROPHONE!

... also, beware of those F%$#IN BIRDS!

Credits

Developers - Azuldev, Bisser, Substain, Spartacus, Lucas-MacPheetus, EnverArco

Artist - Thatonegamer

Producer - StrangerYann

Musicians - Mister_Hippo, Obrunomarques
